Please classify the given software requirements into functional requirement or non-functional requirement. The answer should be one word, i.e. Functional or Non-functional. 

Below are some demonstration examples for you to learn, which consist of a software requirement and its category: 
The system shall be able to provide adequate response times for commonly performed functions under both standard and peak loads across all user interfaces of the application.: Non-functional
Curators shall manage user groups and permissions.: Functional
The MultiMahjongClient will automate the picking up of a tile from the wall if the user has no other option.: Functional
User shall be able to log out of the system by using the logout button.: Functional
The system shall be available for use with minimal downtime.: Non-functional
Systems shall display password fields such that characters entered by the user are not visible.: Non-functional
System shall verify the validity of the antivirus serial key during authorization.: Functional
System shall use the current stock value in calculations.: Functional
System shall be able to request permission from the user to access their location services.: Functional
Administrators can update categories, products, and product details.: Functional
The system shall recommend appropriate educational resources for volunteers.: Functional
Delivery boy shall be able to acknowledge the request.: Functional
System shall be able to register new users and store their information securely in the database.: Functional
A Data Consuming User shall have default visualizations for multi-year datasets.: Functional
The SQL database must have scalable capacity.: Non-functional
System shall allow only admins to update the database.: Non-functional
System shall support basic archival description creation and updates.: Functional
The system shall rotate the picture by 90 degrees.: Functional
The system shall minimize user errors and make error recovery effortless.: Non-functional
The system shall be scalable to accommodate a growing volume of data and users.: Non-functional
The system shall allow users to search for ebooks by title, author, genre, etc. and browse curated collections.: Functional
Users shall be able to register with a unique ID using their email address.: Functional
The user connecting to the server shall have a supported shell (bash, dash, fish, csh, tcsh, ksh, or zsh).: Functional
User shall experience adaptability and flexibility in the app, accommodating evolving user needs, technological advancements, and market trends through modular architectures and extensible design patterns.: Non-functional
System shall allow administrator to block any service by entering the name or selecting from a list.: Functional
Developing this product native-first enables cross-platform functionality.: Non-functional
If the validation succeeds, user shall be redirected to the authorized-user-home page.: Functional
A list of disputes meeting search criteria must be provided, differentiating by color-coded status.: Functional
The system shall be able to add restaurant information upon administrator login.: Functional
User shall be able to share files, screen share, conduct group screen sharing, and send contacts.: Functional
Queries exceeding 1 minute should be terminated.: Non-functional
Only maintainers are allowed to add new videos to the website.: Non-functional
The system shall maintain an inventory of medicines with stock levels and track expiration dates.: Functional
The Teams app shall be designed to scale based on the size of the organization.: Non-functional
System shall be deployable and operational in under one minute upon USB insertion.: Non-functional
System shall have a backup power supply for power failures.: Non-functional
The feature of the application shall provide the optimized route for the given addresses: Functional
The codebase shall be well-maintained with clean coding practices and thorough documentation to facilitate ease of maintenance.: Non-functional
User shall apply video editing effects such as background blur, video speed adjustment, fade in and out, and animated texts and fonts.: Non-functional
System shall provide submission status (Accepted, Wrong Answer, Time Limit Exceeded, etc.) for the user's code solutions.: Non-functional

Now, classify the following given requirement: System shall utilize SSL (Secured Socket Layer) certificate for protection.

User shall experience adaptability and flexibility in the app, accommodating evolving user needs, technological advancements, and market trends through modular architectures and extensible design patterns.: Non-functional
System shall allow administrator to block any service by entering the name or selecting from a list.: Functional
Developing this product native-first enables cross-platform functionality.: Non-functional
If the validation succeeds, user shall be redirected to the authorized-user-home page.: Functional
A list of disputes meeting search criteria must be provided, differentiating by color-coded status.: Functional
The system shall be able to add restaurant information upon administrator login.: Functional
User shall be able to share files, screen share, conduct group screen sharing, and send contacts.: Functional
Queries exceeding 1 minute should be terminated.: Non-functional
Only maintainers are allowed to add new videos to the website.: Non-functional
The system shall maintain an inventory of medicines with stock levels and track expiration dates.: Functional
The Teams app shall be designed to scale based on the size of the organization.: Non-functional
System shall be deployable and operational in under one minute upon USB insertion.: Non-functional
System shall have a backup power supply for power failures.: Non-functional

The codebase shall be well-maintained with clean coding practices and thorough documentation to facilitate ease of maintenance.: Non-functional
User shall apply video editing effects such as background blur, video speed adjustment, fade in and out, and animated texts and fonts.: Non-functional
System shall provide submission status (Accepted, Wrong Answer, Time Limit Exceeded, etc.) for the user's code solutions.: Non-functional

The MultiMahjongClient will automate the picking up of a tile from the wall if the user has no other option.: Functional
User shall be able to log out of the system by using the logout button.: Functional
The system shall be available for use with minimal downtime.: Non-functional
Systems shall display password fields such that characters entered by the user are not visible.: Non-functional
System shall verify the validity of the antivirus serial key during authorization.: Functional
System shall use the current stock value in calculations.: Functional
System shall be able to request permission from the user to access their location services.: Functional
Administrators can update categories, products, and product details.: Functional
The system shall recommend appropriate educational resources for volunteers.: Functional
Delivery boy shall be able to acknowledge the request.: Functional
System shall be able to register new users and store their information securely in the database.: Functional
A Data Consuming User shall have default visualizations for multi-year datasets.: Functional
The SQL database must have scalable capacity.: Non-functional
System shall allow only admins to update the database.: Non-functional
System shall support basic archival description creation and updates.: Functional
The system shall rotate the picture by 90 degrees.: Functional
The system shall minimize user errors and make error recovery effortless.: Non-functional
The system shall be scalable to accommodate a growing volume of data and users.: Non-functional
The system shall allow users to search for ebooks by title, author, genre, etc. and browse curated collections.: Functional
Users shall be able to register with a unique ID using their email address.: Functional
The user connecting to the server shall have a supported shell (bash, dash, fish, csh, tcsh, ksh, or zsh).: Functional
User shall experience adaptability and flexibility in the app, accommodating evolving user needs, technological advancements, and market trends through modular architectures and extensible design patterns.: Non-functional
System shall allow administrator to block any service by entering the name or selecting from a list.: Functional
Developing this product native-first enables cross-platform functionality.: Non-functional
If the validation succeeds, user shall be redirected to the authorized-user-home page.: Functional
A list of disputes meeting search criteria must be provided, differentiating by color-coded status.: Functional
The system shall be able to add restaurant information upon administrator login.: Functional
User shall be able to share files, screen share, conduct group screen sharing, and send contacts.: Functional
Queries exceeding 1 minute should be terminated.: Non-functional
Only maintainers are allowed to add new videos to the website.: Non-functional
The system shall maintain an inventory of medicines with stock levels and track expiration dates.: Functional
The Teams app shall be designed to scale based on the size of the organization.: Non-functional
System shall be deployable and operational in under one minute upon USB insertion.: Non-functional
System shall have a backup power supply for power failures.: Non-functional
The feature of the application shall provide the optimized route for the given addresses: Functional
The codebase shall be well-maintained with clean coding practices and thorough documentation to facilitate ease of maintenance.: Non-functional
User shall apply video editing effects such as background blur, video speed adjustment, fade in and out, and animated texts and fonts.: Non-functional
System shall provide submission status (Accepted, Wrong Answer, Time Limit Exceeded, etc.) for the user's code solutions.: Non-functional

System shall verify the validity of the antivirus serial key during authorization.: Functional
System shall use the current stock value in calculations.: Functional
System shall be able to request permission from the user to access their location services.: Functional
Administrators can update categories, products, and product details.: Functional
The system shall recommend appropriate educational resources for volunteers.: Functional
Delivery boy shall be able to acknowledge the request.: Functional
System shall be able to register new users and store their information securely in the database.: Functional
A Data Consuming User shall have default visualizations for multi-year datasets.: Functional
The SQL database must have scalable capacity.: Non-functional
System shall allow only admins to update the database.: Non-functional
System shall support basic archival description creation and updates.: Functional
The system shall rotate the picture by 90 degrees.: Functional
The system shall minimize user errors and make error recovery effortless.: Non-functional
The system shall be scalable to accommodate a growing volume of data and users.: Non-functional
The system shall allow users to search for ebooks by title, author, genre, etc. and browse curated collections.: Functional
Users shall be able to register with a unique ID using their email address.: Functional
The user connecting to the server shall have a supported shell (bash, dash, fish, csh, tcsh, ksh, or zsh).: Functional
User shall experience adaptability and flexibility in the app, accommodating evolving user needs, technological advancements, and market trends through modular architectures and extensible design patterns.: Non-functional
System shall allow administrator to block any service by entering the name or selecting from a list.: Functional
Developing this product native-first enables cross-platform functionality.: Non-functional
If the validation succeeds, user shall be redirected to the authorized-user-home page.: Functional
A list of disputes meeting search criteria must be provided, differentiating by color-coded status.: Functional
The system shall be able to add restaurant information upon administrator login.: Functional
User shall be able to share files, screen share, conduct group screen sharing, and send contacts.: Functional
Queries exceeding 1 minute should be terminated.: Non-functional
Only maintainers are allowed to add new videos to the website.: Non-functional
The system shall maintain an inventory of medicines with stock levels and track expiration dates.: Functional
The Teams app shall be designed to scale based on the size of the organization.: Non-functional
System shall be deployable and operational in under one minute upon USB insertion.: Non-functional
System shall have a backup power supply for power failures.: Non-functional
The feature of the application shall provide the optimized route for the given addresses: Functional
The codebase shall be well-maintained with clean coding practices and thorough documentation to facilitate ease of maintenance.: Non-functional
User shall apply video editing effects such as background blur, video speed adjustment, fade in and out, and animated texts and fonts.: Non-functional
System shall provide submission status (Accepted, Wrong Answer, Time Limit Exceeded, etc.) for the user's code solutions.: Non-functional

Delivery boy shall be able to acknowledge the request.: Functional
System shall be able to register new users and store their information securely in the database.: Functional
A Data Consuming User shall have default visualizations for multi-year datasets.: Functional
The SQL database must have scalable capacity.: Non-functional
System shall allow only admins to update the database.: Non-functional
System shall support basic archival description creation and updates.: Functional
The system shall rotate the picture by 90 degrees.: Functional
The system shall minimize user errors and make error recovery effortless.: Non-functional
The system shall be scalable to accommodate a growing volume of data and users.: Non-functional
The system shall allow users to search for ebooks by title, author, genre, etc. and browse curated collections.: Functional
Users shall be able to register with a unique ID using their email address.: Functional
The user connecting to the server shall have a supported shell (bash, dash, fish, csh, tcsh, ksh, or zsh).: Functional
User shall experience adaptability and flexibility in the app, accommodating evolving user needs, technological advancements, and market trends through modular architectures and extensible design patterns.: Non-functional
System shall allow administrator to block any service by entering the name or selecting from a list.: Functional
Developing this product native-first enables cross-platform functionality.: Non-functional
If the validation succeeds, user shall be redirected to the authorized-user-home page.: Functional
A list of disputes meeting search criteria must be provided, differentiating by color-coded status.: Functional
The system shall be able to add restaurant information upon administrator login.: Functional
User shall be able to share files, screen share, conduct group screen sharing, and send contacts.: Functional
Queries exceeding 1 minute should be terminated.: Non-functional
Only maintainers are allowed to add new videos to the website.: Non-functional
The system shall maintain an inventory of medicines with stock levels and track expiration dates.: Functional
The Teams app shall be designed to scale based on the size of the organization.: Non-functional
System shall be deployable and operational in under one minute upon USB insertion.: Non-functional
System shall have a backup power supply for power failures.: Non-functional
The feature of the application shall provide the optimized route for the given addresses: Functional
The codebase shall be well-maintained with clean coding practices and thorough documentation to facilitate ease of maintenance.: Non-functional
User shall apply video editing effects such as background blur, video speed adjustment, fade in and out, and animated texts and fonts.: Non-functional
System shall provide submission status (Accepted, Wrong Answer, Time Limit Exceeded, etc.) for the user's code solutions.: Non-functional

The SQL database must have scalable capacity.: Non-functional
System shall allow only admins to update the database.: Non-functional
System shall support basic archival description creation and updates.: Functional
The system shall rotate the picture by 90 degrees.: Functional
The system shall minimize user errors and make error recovery effortless.: Non-functional
The system shall be scalable to accommodate a growing volume of data and users.: Non-functional
The system shall allow users to search for ebooks by title, author, genre, etc. and browse curated collections.: Functional
Users shall be able to register with a unique ID using their email address.: Functional
The user connecting to the server shall have a supported shell (bash, dash, fish, csh, tcsh, ksh, or zsh).: Functional
User shall experience adaptability and flexibility in the app, accommodating evolving user needs, technological advancements, and market trends through modular architectures and extensible design patterns.: Non-functional
System shall allow administrator to block any service by entering the name or selecting from a list.: Functional
Developing this product native-first enables cross-platform functionality.: Non-functional
If the validation succeeds, user shall be redirected to the authorized-user-home page.: Functional
A list of disputes meeting search criteria must be provided, differentiating by color-coded status.: Functional
The system shall be able to add restaurant information upon administrator login.: Functional
User shall be able to share files, screen share, conduct group screen sharing, and send contacts.: Functional
Queries exceeding 1 minute should be terminated.: Non-functional
Only maintainers are allowed to add new videos to the website.: Non-functional
The system shall maintain an inventory of medicines with stock levels and track expiration dates.: Functional
The Teams app shall be designed to scale based on the size of the organization.: Non-functional
System shall be deployable and operational in under one minute upon USB insertion.: Non-functional
System shall have a backup power supply for power failures.: Non-functional
The feature of the application shall provide the optimized route for the given addresses: Functional
The codebase shall be well-maintained with clean coding practices and thorough documentation to facilitate ease of maintenance.: Non-functional
User shall apply video editing effects such as background blur, video speed adjustment, fade in and out, and animated texts and fonts.: Non-functional
System shall provide submission status (Accepted, Wrong Answer, Time Limit Exceeded, etc.) for the user's code solutions.: Non-functional

The system shall be scalable to accommodate a growing volume of data and users.: Non-functional
The system shall allow users to search for ebooks by title, author, genre, etc. and browse curated collections.: Functional
Users shall be able to register with a unique ID using their email address.: Functional
The user connecting to the server shall have a supported shell (bash, dash, fish, csh, tcsh, ksh, or zsh).: Functional
User shall experience adaptability and flexibility in the app, accommodating evolving user needs, technological advancements, and market trends through modular architectures and extensible design patterns.: Non-functional
System shall allow administrator to block any service by entering the name or selecting from a list.: Functional
Developing this product native-first enables cross-platform functionality.: Non-functional
If the validation succeeds, user shall be redirected to the authorized-user-home page.: Functional
A list of disputes meeting search criteria must be provided, differentiating by color-coded status.: Functional
The system shall be able to add restaurant information upon administrator login.: Functional
User shall be able to share files, screen share, conduct group screen sharing, and send contacts.: Functional
Queries exceeding 1 minute should be terminated.: Non-functional
Only maintainers are allowed to add new videos to the website.: Non-functional
The system shall maintain an inventory of medicines with stock levels and track expiration dates.: Functional
The Teams app shall be designed to scale based on the size of the organization.: Non-functional
System shall be deployable and operational in under one minute upon USB insertion.: Non-functional
System shall have a backup power supply for power failures.: Non-functional
The feature of the application shall provide the optimized route for the given addresses: Functional
The codebase shall be well-maintained with clean coding practices and thorough documentation to facilitate ease of maintenance.: Non-functional
User shall apply video editing effects such as background blur, video speed adjustment, fade in and out, and animated texts and fonts.: Non-functional
System shall provide submission status (Accepted, Wrong Answer, Time Limit Exceeded, etc.) for the user's code solutions.: Non-functional

User shall experience adaptability and flexibility in the app, accommodating evolving user needs, technological advancements, and market trends through modular architectures and extensible design patterns.: Non-functional
System shall allow administrator to block any service by entering the name or selecting from a list.: Functional
Developing this product native-first enables cross-platform functionality.: Non-functional
If the validation succeeds, user shall be redirected to the authorized-user-home page.: Functional
A list of disputes meeting search criteria must be provided, differentiating by color-coded status.: Functional
The system shall be able to add restaurant information upon administrator login.: Functional
User shall be able to share files, screen share, conduct group screen sharing, and send contacts.: Functional
Queries exceeding 1 minute should be terminated.: Non-functional
Only maintainers are allowed to add new videos to the website.: Non-functional
The system shall maintain an inventory of medicines with stock levels and track expiration dates.: Functional
The Teams app shall be designed to scale based on the size of the organization.: Non-functional
System shall be deployable and operational in under one minute upon USB insertion.: Non-functional
System shall have a backup power supply for power failures.: Non-functional
The feature of the application shall provide the optimized route for the given addresses: Functional
The codebase shall be well-maintained with clean coding practices and thorough documentation to facilitate ease of maintenance.: Non-functional
User shall apply video editing effects such as background blur, video speed adjustment, fade in and out, and animated texts and fonts.: Non-functional
System shall provide submission status (Accepted, Wrong Answer, Time Limit Exceeded, etc.) for the user's code solutions.: Non-functional

Developing this product native-first enables cross-platform functionality.: Non-functional
If the validation succeeds, user shall be redirected to the authorized-user-home page.: Functional
A list of disputes meeting search criteria must be provided, differentiating by color-coded status.: Functional
The system shall be able to add restaurant information upon administrator login.: Functional
User shall be able to share files, screen share, conduct group screen sharing, and send contacts.: Functional
Queries exceeding 1 minute should be terminated.: Non-functional
Only maintainers are allowed to add new videos to the website.: Non-functional
The system shall maintain an inventory of medicines with stock levels and track expiration dates.: Functional
The Teams app shall be designed to scale based on the size of the organization.: Non-functional
System shall be deployable and operational in under one minute upon USB insertion.: Non-functional
System shall have a backup power supply for power failures.: Non-functional
The feature of the application shall provide the optimized route for the given addresses: Functional
The codebase shall be well-maintained with clean coding practices and thorough documentation to facilitate ease of maintenance.: Non-functional
User shall apply video editing effects such as background blur, video speed adjustment, fade in and out, and animated texts and fonts.: Non-functional
System shall provide submission status (Accepted, Wrong Answer, Time Limit Exceeded, etc.) for the user's code solutions.: Non-functional

User shall be able to share files, screen share, conduct group screen sharing, and send contacts.: Functional
Queries exceeding 1 minute should be terminated.: Non-functional
Only maintainers are allowed to add new videos to the website.: Non-functional
The system shall maintain an inventory of medicines with stock levels and track expiration dates.: Functional
The Teams app shall be designed to scale based on the size of the organization.: Non-functional
System shall be deployable and operational in under one minute upon USB insertion.: Non-functional
System shall have a backup power supply for power failures.: Non-functional
The feature of the application shall provide the optimized route for the given addresses: Functional
The codebase shall be well-maintained with clean coding practices and thorough documentation to facilitate ease of maintenance.: Non-functional
User shall apply video editing effects such as background blur, video speed adjustment, fade in and out, and animated texts and fonts.: Non-functional
System shall provide submission status (Accepted, Wrong Answer, Time Limit Exceeded, etc.) for the user's code solutions.: Non-functional

The Teams app shall be designed to scale based on the size of the organization.: Non-functional
System shall be deployable and operational in under one minute upon USB insertion.: Non-functional
System shall have a backup power supply for power failures.: Non-functional
The feature of the application shall provide the optimized route for the given addresses: Functional
The codebase shall be well-maintained with clean coding practices and thorough documentation to facilitate ease of maintenance.: Non-functional
User shall apply video editing effects such as background blur, video speed adjustment, fade in and out, and animated texts and fonts.: Non-functional
System shall provide submission status (Accepted, Wrong Answer, Time Limit Exceeded, etc.) for the user's code solutions.: Non-functional

The feature of the application shall provide the optimized route for the given addresses: Functional
The codebase shall be well-maintained with clean coding practices and thorough documentation to facilitate ease of maintenance.: Non-functional
User shall apply video editing effects such as background blur, video speed adjustment, fade in and out, and animated texts and fonts.: Non-functional
System shall provide submission status (Accepted, Wrong Answer, Time Limit Exceeded, etc.) for the user's code solutions.: Non-functional

Now, classify the following given requirement: User shall be able to process data, reloading if necessary, and accurately handle attributes for recommendations.

The user connecting to the server shall have a supported shell (bash, dash, fish, csh, tcsh, ksh, or zsh).: Functional
User shall experience adaptability and flexibility in the app, accommodating evolving user needs, technological advancements, and market trends through modular architectures and extensible design patterns.: Non-functional
System shall allow administrator to block any service by entering the name or selecting from a list.: Functional
Developing this product native-first enables cross-platform functionality.: Non-functional
If the validation succeeds, user shall be redirected to the authorized-user-home page.: Functional

The system shall be able to add restaurant information upon administrator login.: Functional

System shall provide submission status (Accepted, Wrong Answer, Time Limit Exceeded, etc.) for the user's code solutions.: Non-functional

System shall allow administrator to block any service by entering the name or selecting from a list.: Functional

If the validation succeeds, user shall be redirected to the authorized-user-home page.: Functional

Only maintainers are allowed to add new videos to the website.: Non-functional
The system shall maintain an inventory of medicines with stock levels and track expiration dates.: Functional

Please classify the given software requirements into functional requirement or non-functional requirement. The answer should be one word, i.e. Functional or Non-functional. 

Below are some demonstration examples for you to learn, which consist of a software requirement and its category: 
The system shall be able to provide adequate response times for commonly performed functions under both standard and peak loads across all user interfaces of the application.: Non-functional
Curators shall manage user groups and permissions.: Functional
The MultiMahjongClient will automate the picking up of a tile from the wall if the user has no other option.: Functional
User shall be able to log out of the system by using the logout button.: Functional
The system shall be available for use with minimal downtime.: Non-functional
Systems shall display password fields such that characters entered by the user are not visible.: Non-functional
System shall verify the validity of the antivirus serial key during authorization.: Functional
System shall use the current stock value in calculations.: Functional
System shall be able to request permission from the user to access their location services.: Functional
Administrators can update categories, products, and product details.: Functional
The system shall recommend appropriate educational resources for volunteers.: Functional
Delivery boy shall be able to acknowledge the request.: Functional
System shall be able to register new users and store their information securely in the database.: Functional
A Data Consuming User shall have default visualizations for multi-year datasets.: Functional
The SQL database must have scalable capacity.: Non-functional
System shall allow only admins to update the database.: Non-functional
System shall support basic archival description creation and updates.: Functional
The system shall rotate the picture by 90 degrees.: Functional
The system shall minimize user errors and make error recovery effortless.: Non-functional
The system shall be scalable to accommodate a growing volume of data and users.: Non-functional
The system shall allow users to search for ebooks by title, author, genre, etc. and browse curated collections.: Functional
Users shall be able to register with a unique ID using their email address.: Functional
The user connecting to the server shall have a supported shell (bash, dash, fish, csh, tcsh, ksh, or zsh).: Functional
User shall experience adaptability and flexibility in the app, accommodating evolving user needs, technological advancements, and market trends through modular architectures and extensible design patterns.: Non-functional
System shall allow administrator to block any service by entering the name or selecting from a list.: Functional
Developing this product native-first enables cross-platform functionality.: Non-functional
If the validation succeeds, user shall be redirected to the authorized-user-home page.: Functional
A list of disputes meeting search criteria must be provided, differentiating by color-coded status.: Functional
The system shall be able to add restaurant information upon administrator login.: Functional
User shall be able to share files, screen share, conduct group screen sharing, and send contacts.: Functional
Queries exceeding 1 minute should be terminated.: Non-functional
Only maintainers are allowed to add new videos to the website.: Non-functional
The system shall maintain an inventory of medicines with stock levels and track expiration dates.: Functional
The Teams app shall be designed to scale based on the size of the organization.: Non-functional
System shall be deployable and operational in under one minute upon USB insertion.: Non-functional
System shall have a backup power supply for power failures.: Non-functional
The feature of the application shall provide the optimized route for the given addresses: Functional
The codebase shall be well-maintained with clean coding practices and thorough documentation to facilitate ease of maintenance.: Non-functional
User shall apply video editing effects such as background blur, video speed adjustment, fade in and out, and animated texts and fonts.: Non-functional
System shall provide submission status (Accepted, Wrong Answer, Time Limit Exceeded, etc.) for the user's code solutions.: Non-functional

Below are some demonstration examples for you to learn, which consist of a software requirement and its category: 
The system shall be able to provide adequate response times for commonly performed functions under both standard and peak loads across all user interfaces of the application.: Non-functional
Curators shall manage user groups and permissions.: Functional
The MultiMahjongClient will automate the picking up of a tile from the wall if the user has no other option.: Functional
User shall be able to log out of the system by using the logout button.: Functional
The system shall be available for use with minimal downtime.: Non-functional
Systems shall display password fields such that characters entered by the user are not visible.: Non-functional
System shall verify the validity of the antivirus serial key during authorization.: Functional
System shall use the current stock value in calculations.: Functional
System shall be able to request permission from the user to access their location services.: Functional
Administrators can update categories, products, and product details.: Functional
The system shall recommend appropriate educational resources for volunteers.: Functional
Delivery boy shall be able to acknowledge the request.: Functional
System shall be able to register new users and store their information securely in the database.: Functional
A Data Consuming User shall have default visualizations for multi-year datasets.: Functional
The SQL database must have scalable capacity.: Non-functional
System shall allow only admins to update the database.: Non-functional
System shall support basic archival description creation and updates.: Functional
The system shall rotate the picture by 90 degrees.: Functional
The system shall minimize user errors and make error recovery effortless.: Non-functional
The system shall be scalable to accommodate a growing volume of data and users.: Non-functional
The system shall allow users to search for ebooks by title, author, genre, etc. and browse curated collections.: Functional
Users shall be able to register with a unique ID using their email address.: Functional
The user connecting to the server shall have a supported shell (bash, dash, fish, csh, tcsh, ksh, or zsh).: Functional
User shall experience adaptability and flexibility in the app, accommodating evolving user needs, technological advancements, and market trends through modular architectures and extensible design patterns.: Non-functional
System shall allow administrator to block any service by entering the name or selecting from a list.: Functional
Developing this product native-first enables cross-platform functionality.: Non-functional
If the validation succeeds, user shall be redirected to the authorized-user-home page.: Functional
A list of disputes meeting search criteria must be provided, differentiating by color-coded status.: Functional
The system shall be able to add restaurant information upon administrator login.: Functional
User shall be able to share files, screen share, conduct group screen sharing, and send contacts.: Functional
Queries exceeding 1 minute should be terminated.: Non-functional
Only maintainers are allowed to add new videos to the website.: Non-functional
The system shall maintain an inventory of medicines with stock levels and track expiration dates.: Functional
The Teams app shall be designed to scale based on the size of the organization.: Non-functional
System shall be deployable and operational in under one minute upon USB insertion.: Non-functional
System shall have a backup power supply for power failures.: Non-functional
The feature of the application shall provide the optimized route for the given addresses: Functional
The codebase shall be well-maintained with clean coding practices and thorough documentation to facilitate ease of maintenance.: Non-functional
User shall apply video editing effects such as background blur, video speed adjustment, fade in and out, and animated texts and fonts.: Non-functional
System shall provide submission status (Accepted, Wrong Answer, Time Limit Exceeded, etc.) for the user's code solutions.: Non-functional

User shall be able to log out of the system by using the logout button.: Functional
The system shall be available for use with minimal downtime.: Non-functional
Systems shall display password fields such that characters entered by the user are not visible.: Non-functional
System shall verify the validity of the antivirus serial key during authorization.: Functional
System shall use the current stock value in calculations.: Functional
System shall be able to request permission from the user to access their location services.: Functional
Administrators can update categories, products, and product details.: Functional
The system shall recommend appropriate educational resources for volunteers.: Functional
Delivery boy shall be able to acknowledge the request.: Functional
System shall be able to register new users and store their information securely in the database.: Functional
A Data Consuming User shall have default visualizations for multi-year datasets.: Functional
The SQL database must have scalable capacity.: Non-functional
System shall allow only admins to update the database.: Non-functional
System shall support basic archival description creation and updates.: Functional
The system shall rotate the picture by 90 degrees.: Functional
The system shall minimize user errors and make error recovery effortless.: Non-functional
The system shall be scalable to accommodate a growing volume of data and users.: Non-functional
The system shall allow users to search for ebooks by title, author, genre, etc. and browse curated collections.: Functional
Users shall be able to register with a unique ID using their email address.: Functional
The user connecting to the server shall have a supported shell (bash, dash, fish, csh, tcsh, ksh, or zsh).: Functional
User shall experience adaptability and flexibility in the app, accommodating evolving user needs, technological advancements, and market trends through modular architectures and extensible design patterns.: Non-functional
System shall allow administrator to block any service by entering the name or selecting from a list.: Functional
Developing this product native-first enables cross-platform functionality.: Non-functional
If the validation succeeds, user shall be redirected to the authorized-user-home page.: Functional
A list of disputes meeting search criteria must be provided, differentiating by color-coded status.: Functional
The system shall be able to add restaurant information upon administrator login.: Functional
User shall be able to share files, screen share, conduct group screen sharing, and send contacts.: Functional
Queries exceeding 1 minute should be terminated.: Non-functional
Only maintainers are allowed to add new videos to the website.: Non-functional
The system shall maintain an inventory of medicines with stock levels and track expiration dates.: Functional
The Teams app shall be designed to scale based on the size of the organization.: Non-functional
System shall be deployable and operational in under one minute upon USB insertion.: Non-functional
System shall have a backup power supply for power failures.: Non-functional
The feature of the application shall provide the optimized route for the given addresses: Functional
The codebase shall be well-maintained with clean coding practices and thorough documentation to facilitate ease of maintenance.: Non-functional
User shall apply video editing effects such as background blur, video speed adjustment, fade in and out, and animated texts and fonts.: Non-functional
System shall provide submission status (Accepted, Wrong Answer, Time Limit Exceeded, etc.) for the user's code solutions.: Non-functional

System shall verify the validity of the antivirus serial key during authorization.: Functional
System shall use the current stock value in calculations.: Functional
System shall be able to request permission from the user to access their location services.: Functional
Administrators can update categories, products, and product details.: Functional
The system shall recommend appropriate educational resources for volunteers.: Functional
Delivery boy shall be able to acknowledge the request.: Functional
System shall be able to register new users and store their information securely in the database.: Functional
A Data Consuming User shall have default visualizations for multi-year datasets.: Functional
The SQL database must have scalable capacity.: Non-functional
System shall allow only admins to update the database.: Non-functional
System shall support basic archival description creation and updates.: Functional
The system shall rotate the picture by 90 degrees.: Functional
The system shall minimize user errors and make error recovery effortless.: Non-functional
The system shall be scalable to accommodate a growing volume of data and users.: Non-functional
The system shall allow users to search for ebooks by title, author, genre, etc. and browse curated collections.: Functional
Users shall be able to register with a unique ID using their email address.: Functional
The user connecting to the server shall have a supported shell (bash, dash, fish, csh, tcsh, ksh, or zsh).: Functional
User shall experience adaptability and flexibility in the app, accommodating evolving user needs, technological advancements, and market trends through modular architectures and extensible design patterns.: Non-functional
System shall allow administrator to block any service by entering the name or selecting from a list.: Functional
Developing this product native-first enables cross-platform functionality.: Non-functional
If the validation succeeds, user shall be redirected to the authorized-user-home page.: Functional
A list of disputes meeting search criteria must be provided, differentiating by color-coded status.: Functional
The system shall be able to add restaurant information upon administrator login.: Functional
User shall be able to share files, screen share, conduct group screen sharing, and send contacts.: Functional
Queries exceeding 1 minute should be terminated.: Non-functional
Only maintainers are allowed to add new videos to the website.: Non-functional
The system shall maintain an inventory of medicines with stock levels and track expiration dates.: Functional
The Teams app shall be designed to scale based on the size of the organization.: Non-functional
System shall be deployable and operational in under one minute upon USB insertion.: Non-functional
System shall have a backup power supply for power failures.: Non-functional
The feature of the application shall provide the optimized route for the given addresses: Functional
The codebase shall be well-maintained with clean coding practices and thorough documentation to facilitate ease of maintenance.: Non-functional
User shall apply video editing effects such as background blur, video speed adjustment, fade in and out, and animated texts and fonts.: Non-functional
System shall provide submission status (Accepted, Wrong Answer, Time Limit Exceeded, etc.) for the user's code solutions.: Non-functional

System shall be able to register new users and store their information securely in the database.: Functional
A Data Consuming User shall have default visualizations for multi-year datasets.: Functional
The SQL database must have scalable capacity.: Non-functional
System shall allow only admins to update the database.: Non-functional
System shall support basic archival description creation and updates.: Functional
The system shall rotate the picture by 90 degrees.: Functional
The system shall minimize user errors and make error recovery effortless.: Non-functional
The system shall be scalable to accommodate a growing volume of data and users.: Non-functional
The system shall allow users to search for ebooks by title, author, genre, etc. and browse curated collections.: Functional
Users shall be able to register with a unique ID using their email address.: Functional
The user connecting to the server shall have a supported shell (bash, dash, fish, csh, tcsh, ksh, or zsh).: Functional
User shall experience adaptability and flexibility in the app, accommodating evolving user needs, technological advancements, and market trends through modular architectures and extensible design patterns.: Non-functional
System shall allow administrator to block any service by entering the name or selecting from a list.: Functional
Developing this product native-first enables cross-platform functionality.: Non-functional
If the validation succeeds, user shall be redirected to the authorized-user-home page.: Functional
A list of disputes meeting search criteria must be provided, differentiating by color-coded status.: Functional
The system shall be able to add restaurant information upon administrator login.: Functional
User shall be able to share files, screen share, conduct group screen sharing, and send contacts.: Functional
Queries exceeding 1 minute should be terminated.: Non-functional
Only maintainers are allowed to add new videos to the website.: Non-functional
The system shall maintain an inventory of medicines with stock levels and track expiration dates.: Functional
The Teams app shall be designed to scale based on the size of the organization.: Non-functional
System shall be deployable and operational in under one minute upon USB insertion.: Non-functional
System shall have a backup power supply for power failures.: Non-functional
The feature of the application shall provide the optimized route for the given addresses: Functional
The codebase shall be well-maintained with clean coding practices and thorough documentation to facilitate ease of maintenance.: Non-functional
User shall apply video editing effects such as background blur, video speed adjustment, fade in and out, and animated texts and fonts.: Non-functional
System shall provide submission status (Accepted, Wrong Answer, Time Limit Exceeded, etc.) for the user's code solutions.: Non-functional

The system shall rotate the picture by 90 degrees.: Functional
The system shall minimize user errors and make error recovery effortless.: Non-functional
The system shall be scalable to accommodate a growing volume of data and users.: Non-functional
The system shall allow users to search for ebooks by title, author, genre, etc. and browse curated collections.: Functional
Users shall be able to register with a unique ID using their email address.: Functional
The user connecting to the server shall have a supported shell (bash, dash, fish, csh, tcsh, ksh, or zsh).: Functional
User shall experience adaptability and flexibility in the app, accommodating evolving user needs, technological advancements, and market trends through modular architectures and extensible design patterns.: Non-functional
System shall allow administrator to block any service by entering the name or selecting from a list.: Functional
Developing this product native-first enables cross-platform functionality.: Non-functional
If the validation succeeds, user shall be redirected to the authorized-user-home page.: Functional
A list of disputes meeting search criteria must be provided, differentiating by color-coded status.: Functional
The system shall be able to add restaurant information upon administrator login.: Functional
User shall be able to share files, screen share, conduct group screen sharing, and send contacts.: Functional
Queries exceeding 1 minute should be terminated.: Non-functional
Only maintainers are allowed to add new videos to the website.: Non-functional
The system shall maintain an inventory of medicines with stock levels and track expiration dates.: Functional
The Teams app shall be designed to scale based on the size of the organization.: Non-functional
System shall be deployable and operational in under one minute upon USB insertion.: Non-functional
System shall have a backup power supply for power failures.: Non-functional
The feature of the application shall provide the optimized route for the given addresses: Functional
The codebase shall be well-maintained with clean coding practices and thorough documentation to facilitate ease of maintenance.: Non-functional
User shall apply video editing effects such as background blur, video speed adjustment, fade in and out, and animated texts and fonts.: Non-functional
System shall provide submission status (Accepted, Wrong Answer, Time Limit Exceeded, etc.) for the user's code solutions.: Non-functional

The user connecting to the server shall have a supported shell (bash, dash, fish, csh, tcsh, ksh, or zsh).: Functional
User shall experience adaptability and flexibility in the app, accommodating evolving user needs, technological advancements, and market trends through modular architectures and extensible design patterns.: Non-functional
System shall allow administrator to block any service by entering the name or selecting from a list.: Functional
Developing this product native-first enables cross-platform functionality.: Non-functional
If the validation succeeds, user shall be redirected to the authorized-user-home page.: Functional
A list of disputes meeting search criteria must be provided, differentiating by color-coded status.: Functional
The system shall be able to add restaurant information upon administrator login.: Functional
User shall be able to share files, screen share, conduct group screen sharing, and send contacts.: Functional
Queries exceeding 1 minute should be terminated.: Non-functional
Only maintainers are allowed to add new videos to the website.: Non-functional
The system shall maintain an inventory of medicines with stock levels and track expiration dates.: Functional
The Teams app shall be designed to scale based on the size of the organization.: Non-functional
System shall be deployable and operational in under one minute upon USB insertion.: Non-functional
System shall have a backup power supply for power failures.: Non-functional
The feature of the application shall provide the optimized route for the given addresses: Functional
The codebase shall be well-maintained with clean coding practices and thorough documentation to facilitate ease of maintenance.: Non-functional
User shall apply video editing effects such as background blur, video speed adjustment, fade in and out, and animated texts and fonts.: Non-functional
System shall provide submission status (Accepted, Wrong Answer, Time Limit Exceeded, etc.) for the user's code solutions.: Non-functional

User shall experience adaptability and flexibility in the app, accommodating evolving user needs, technological advancements, and market trends through modular architectures and extensible design patterns.: Non-functional
System shall allow administrator to block any service by entering the name or selecting from a list.: Functional
Developing this product native-first enables cross-platform functionality.: Non-functional
If the validation succeeds, user shall be redirected to the authorized-user-home page.: Functional
A list of disputes meeting search criteria must be provided, differentiating by color-coded status.: Functional
The system shall be able to add restaurant information upon administrator login.: Functional
User shall be able to share files, screen share, conduct group screen sharing, and send contacts.: Functional
Queries exceeding 1 minute should be terminated.: Non-functional
Only maintainers are allowed to add new videos to the website.: Non-functional
The system shall maintain an inventory of medicines with stock levels and track expiration dates.: Functional
The Teams app shall be designed to scale based on the size of the organization.: Non-functional
System shall be deployable and operational in under one minute upon USB insertion.: Non-functional
System shall have a backup power supply for power failures.: Non-functional
The feature of the application shall provide the optimized route for the given addresses: Functional
The codebase shall be well-maintained with clean coding practices and thorough documentation to facilitate ease of maintenance.: Non-functional
User shall apply video editing effects such as background blur, video speed adjustment, fade in and out, and animated texts and fonts.: Non-functional
System shall provide submission status (Accepted, Wrong Answer, Time Limit Exceeded, etc.) for the user's code solutions.: Non-functional

A list of disputes meeting search criteria must be provided, differentiating by color-coded status.: Functional
The system shall be able to add restaurant information upon administrator login.: Functional
User shall be able to share files, screen share, conduct group screen sharing, and send contacts.: Functional
Queries exceeding 1 minute should be terminated.: Non-functional
Only maintainers are allowed to add new videos to the website.: Non-functional
The system shall maintain an inventory of medicines with stock levels and track expiration dates.: Functional
The Teams app shall be designed to scale based on the size of the organization.: Non-functional
System shall be deployable and operational in under one minute upon USB insertion.: Non-functional
System shall have a backup power supply for power failures.: Non-functional
The feature of the application shall provide the optimized route for the given addresses: Functional
The codebase shall be well-maintained with clean coding practices and thorough documentation to facilitate ease of maintenance.: Non-functional
User shall apply video editing effects such as background blur, video speed adjustment, fade in and out, and animated texts and fonts.: Non-functional
System shall provide submission status (Accepted, Wrong Answer, Time Limit Exceeded, etc.) for the user's code solutions.: Non-functional

Only maintainers are allowed to add new videos to the website.: Non-functional
The system shall maintain an inventory of medicines with stock levels and track expiration dates.: Functional
The Teams app shall be designed to scale based on the size of the organization.: Non-functional
System shall be deployable and operational in under one minute upon USB insertion.: Non-functional
System shall have a backup power supply for power failures.: Non-functional
The feature of the application shall provide the optimized route for the given addresses: Functional
The codebase shall be well-maintained with clean coding practices and thorough documentation to facilitate ease of maintenance.: Non-functional
User shall apply video editing effects such as background blur, video speed adjustment, fade in and out, and animated texts and fonts.: Non-functional
System shall provide submission status (Accepted, Wrong Answer, Time Limit Exceeded, etc.) for the user's code solutions.: Non-functional

The codebase shall be well-maintained with clean coding practices and thorough documentation to facilitate ease of maintenance.: Non-functional
User shall apply video editing effects such as background blur, video speed adjustment, fade in and out, and animated texts and fonts.: Non-functional
System shall provide submission status (Accepted, Wrong Answer, Time Limit Exceeded, etc.) for the user's code solutions.: Non-functional

Please classify the given software requirements into functional requirement or non-functional requirement. The answer should be one word, i.e. Functional or Non-functional. 

Below are some demonstration examples for you to learn, which consist of a software requirement and its category: 
The system shall be able to provide adequate response times for commonly performed functions under both standard and peak loads across all user interfaces of the application.: Non-functional

User shall be able to log out of the system by using the logout button.: Functional
The system shall be available for use with minimal downtime.: Non-functional
Systems shall display password fields such that characters entered by the user are not visible.: Non-functional
System shall verify the validity of the antivirus serial key during authorization.: Functional
System shall use the current stock value in calculations.: Functional
System shall be able to request permission from the user to access their location services.: Functional
Administrators can update categories, products, and product details.: Functional
The system shall recommend appropriate educational resources for volunteers.: Functional

A Data Consuming User shall have default visualizations for multi-year datasets.: Functional
The SQL database must have scalable capacity.: Non-functional
System shall allow only admins to update the database.: Non-functional
System shall support basic archival description creation and updates.: Functional
The system shall rotate the picture by 90 degrees.: Functional
The system shall minimize user errors and make error recovery effortless.: Non-functional
The system shall be scalable to accommodate a growing volume of data and users.: Non-functional
The system shall allow users to search for ebooks by title, author, genre, etc. and browse curated collections.: Functional
Users shall be able to register with a unique ID using their email address.: Functional
The user connecting to the server shall have a supported shell (bash, dash, fish, csh, tcsh, ksh, or zsh).: Functional
User shall experience adaptability and flexibility in the app, accommodating evolving user needs, technological advancements, and market trends through modular architectures and extensible design patterns.: Non-functional
System shall allow administrator to block any service by entering the name or selecting from a list.: Functional
Developing this product native-first enables cross-platform functionality.: Non-functional
If the validation succeeds, user shall be redirected to the authorized-user-home page.: Functional
A list of disputes meeting search criteria must be provided, differentiating by color-coded status.: Functional
The system shall be able to add restaurant information upon administrator login.: Functional
User shall be able to share files, screen share, conduct group screen sharing, and send contacts.: Functional
Queries exceeding 1 minute should be terminated.: Non-functional
Only maintainers are allowed to add new videos to the website.: Non-functional
The system shall maintain an inventory of medicines with stock levels and track expiration dates.: Functional
The Teams app shall be designed to scale based on the size of the organization.: Non-functional

Please classify the given software requirements into functional requirement or non-functional requirement. The answer should be one word, i.e. Functional or Non-functional. 

Below are some demonstration examples for you to learn, which consist of a software requirement and its category: 
The system shall be able to provide adequate response times for commonly performed functions under both standard and peak loads across all user interfaces of the application.: Non-functional
Curators shall manage user groups and permissions.: Functional
The MultiMahjongClient will automate the picking up of a tile from the wall if the user has no other option.: Functional

The system shall be available for use with minimal downtime.: Non-functional
Systems shall display password fields such that characters entered by the user are not visible.: Non-functional

System shall use the current stock value in calculations.: Functional
System shall be able to request permission from the user to access their location services.: Functional
Administrators can update categories, products, and product details.: Functional
The system shall recommend appropriate educational resources for volunteers.: Functional

A Data Consuming User shall have default visualizations for multi-year datasets.: Functional
The SQL database must have scalable capacity.: Non-functional
System shall allow only admins to update the database.: Non-functional
System shall support basic archival description creation and updates.: Functional
The system shall rotate the picture by 90 degrees.: Functional
The system shall minimize user errors and make error recovery effortless.: Non-functional
The system shall be scalable to accommodate a growing volume of data and users.: Non-functional
The system shall allow users to search for ebooks by title, author, genre, etc. and browse curated collections.: Functional
Users shall be able to register with a unique ID using their email address.: Functional
The user connecting to the server shall have a supported shell (bash, dash, fish, csh, tcsh, ksh, or zsh).: Functional
User shall experience adaptability and flexibility in the app, accommodating evolving user needs, technological advancements, and market trends through modular architectures and extensible design patterns.: Non-functional
System shall allow administrator to block any service by entering the name or selecting from a list.: Functional
Developing this product native-first enables cross-platform functionality.: Non-functional
If the validation succeeds, user shall be redirected to the authorized-user-home page.: Functional
A list of disputes meeting search criteria must be provided, differentiating by color-coded status.: Functional
The system shall be able to add restaurant information upon administrator login.: Functional
User shall be able to share files, screen share, conduct group screen sharing, and send contacts.: Functional
Queries exceeding 1 minute should be terminated.: Non-functional
Only maintainers are allowed to add new videos to the website.: Non-functional
The system shall maintain an inventory of medicines with stock levels and track expiration dates.: Functional
The Teams app shall be designed to scale based on the size of the organization.: Non-functional
System shall be deployable and operational in under one minute upon USB insertion.: Non-functional
System shall have a backup power supply for power failures.: Non-functional

Please classify the given software requirements into functional requirement or non-functional requirement. The answer should be one word, i.e. Functional or Non-functional. 

Below are some demonstration examples for you to learn, which consist of a software requirement and its category: 
The system shall be able to provide adequate response times for commonly performed functions under both standard and peak loads across all user interfaces of the application.: Non-functional
Curators shall manage user groups and permissions.: Functional
The MultiMahjongClient will automate the picking up of a tile from the wall if the user has no other option.: Functional
User shall be able to log out of the system by using the logout button.: Functional
The system shall be available for use with minimal downtime.: Non-functional
Systems shall display password fields such that characters entered by the user are not visible.: Non-functional
System shall verify the validity of the antivirus serial key during authorization.: Functional
System shall use the current stock value in calculations.: Functional
System shall be able to request permission from the user to access their location services.: Functional
Administrators can update categories, products, and product details.: Functional
The system shall recommend appropriate educational resources for volunteers.: Functional
Delivery boy shall be able to acknowledge the request.: Functional
System shall be able to register new users and store their information securely in the database.: Functional
A Data Consuming User shall have default visualizations for multi-year datasets.: Functional
The SQL database must have scalable capacity.: Non-functional
System shall allow only admins to update the database.: Non-functional
System shall support basic archival description creation and updates.: Functional
The system shall rotate the picture by 90 degrees.: Functional
The system shall minimize user errors and make error recovery effortless.: Non-functional
The system shall be scalable to accommodate a growing volume of data and users.: Non-functional
The system shall allow users to search for ebooks by title, author, genre, etc. and browse curated collections.: Functional
Users shall be able to register with a unique ID using their email address.: Functional
The user connecting to the server shall have a supported shell (bash, dash, fish, csh, tcsh, ksh, or zsh).: Functional
User shall experience adaptability and flexibility in the app, accommodating evolving user needs, technological advancements, and market trends through modular architectures and extensible design patterns.: Non-functional
System shall allow administrator to block any service by entering the name or selecting from a list.: Functional
Developing this product native-first enables cross-platform functionality.: Non-functional
If the validation succeeds, user shall be redirected to the authorized-user-home page.: Functional
A list of disputes meeting search criteria must be provided, differentiating by color-coded status.: Functional
The system shall be able to add restaurant information upon administrator login.: Functional
User shall be able to share files, screen share, conduct group screen sharing, and send contacts.: Functional
Queries exceeding 1 minute should be terminated.: Non-functional
Only maintainers are allowed to add new videos to the website.: Non-functional
The system shall maintain an inventory of medicines with stock levels and track expiration dates.: Functional
The Teams app shall be designed to scale based on the size of the organization.: Non-functional
System shall be deployable and operational in under one minute upon USB insertion.: Non-functional
System shall have a backup power supply for power failures.: Non-functional
The feature of the application shall provide the optimized route for the given addresses: Functional
The codebase shall be well-maintained with clean coding practices and thorough documentation to facilitate ease of maintenance.: Non-functional
User shall apply video editing effects such as background blur, video speed adjustment, fade in and out, and animated texts and fonts.: Non-functional
System shall provide submission status (Accepted, Wrong Answer, Time Limit Exceeded, etc.) for the user's code solutions.: Non-functional

User shall be able to log out of the system by using the logout button.: Functional
The system shall be available for use with minimal downtime.: Non-functional
Systems shall display password fields such that characters entered by the user are not visible.: Non-functional
System shall verify the validity of the antivirus serial key during authorization.: Functional
System shall use the current stock value in calculations.: Functional
System shall be able to request permission from the user to access their location services.: Functional
Administrators can update categories, products, and product details.: Functional
The system shall recommend appropriate educational resources for volunteers.: Functional
Delivery boy shall be able to acknowledge the request.: Functional
System shall be able to register new users and store their information securely in the database.: Functional
A Data Consuming User shall have default visualizations for multi-year datasets.: Functional
The SQL database must have scalable capacity.: Non-functional
System shall allow only admins to update the database.: Non-functional
System shall support basic archival description creation and updates.: Functional
The system shall rotate the picture by 90 degrees.: Functional
The system shall minimize user errors and make error recovery effortless.: Non-functional
The system shall be scalable to accommodate a growing volume of data and users.: Non-functional
The system shall allow users to search for ebooks by title, author, genre, etc. and browse curated collections.: Functional
Users shall be able to register with a unique ID using their email address.: Functional
The user connecting to the server shall have a supported shell (bash, dash, fish, csh, tcsh, ksh, or zsh).: Functional
User shall experience adaptability and flexibility in the app, accommodating evolving user needs, technological advancements, and market trends through modular architectures and extensible design patterns.: Non-functional
System shall allow administrator to block any service by entering the name or selecting from a list.: Functional
Developing this product native-first enables cross-platform functionality.: Non-functional
If the validation succeeds, user shall be redirected to the authorized-user-home page.: Functional
A list of disputes meeting search criteria must be provided, differentiating by color-coded status.: Functional
The system shall be able to add restaurant information upon administrator login.: Functional
User shall be able to share files, screen share, conduct group screen sharing, and send contacts.: Functional
Queries exceeding 1 minute should be terminated.: Non-functional
Only maintainers are allowed to add new videos to the website.: Non-functional
The system shall maintain an inventory of medicines with stock levels and track expiration dates.: Functional
The Teams app shall be designed to scale based on the size of the organization.: Non-functional
System shall be deployable and operational in under one minute upon USB insertion.: Non-functional
System shall have a backup power supply for power failures.: Non-functional
The feature of the application shall provide the optimized route for the given addresses: Functional
The codebase shall be well-maintained with clean coding practices and thorough documentation to facilitate ease of maintenance.: Non-functional
User shall apply video editing effects such as background blur, video speed adjustment, fade in and out, and animated texts and fonts.: Non-functional
System shall provide submission status (Accepted, Wrong Answer, Time Limit Exceeded, etc.) for the user's code solutions.: Non-functional

System shall verify the validity of the antivirus serial key during authorization.: Functional
System shall use the current stock value in calculations.: Functional
System shall be able to request permission from the user to access their location services.: Functional
Administrators can update categories, products, and product details.: Functional
The system shall recommend appropriate educational resources for volunteers.: Functional
Delivery boy shall be able to acknowledge the request.: Functional
System shall be able to register new users and store their information securely in the database.: Functional
A Data Consuming User shall have default visualizations for multi-year datasets.: Functional
The SQL database must have scalable capacity.: Non-functional
System shall allow only admins to update the database.: Non-functional
System shall support basic archival description creation and updates.: Functional
The system shall rotate the picture by 90 degrees.: Functional
The system shall minimize user errors and make error recovery effortless.: Non-functional
The system shall be scalable to accommodate a growing volume of data and users.: Non-functional
The system shall allow users to search for ebooks by title, author, genre, etc. and browse curated collections.: Functional
Users shall be able to register with a unique ID using their email address.: Functional
The user connecting to the server shall have a supported shell (bash, dash, fish, csh, tcsh, ksh, or zsh).: Functional
User shall experience adaptability and flexibility in the app, accommodating evolving user needs, technological advancements, and market trends through modular architectures and extensible design patterns.: Non-functional
System shall allow administrator to block any service by entering the name or selecting from a list.: Functional
Developing this product native-first enables cross-platform functionality.: Non-functional
If the validation succeeds, user shall be redirected to the authorized-user-home page.: Functional
A list of disputes meeting search criteria must be provided, differentiating by color-coded status.: Functional
The system shall be able to add restaurant information upon administrator login.: Functional
User shall be able to share files, screen share, conduct group screen sharing, and send contacts.: Functional
Queries exceeding 1 minute should be terminated.: Non-functional
Only maintainers are allowed to add new videos to the website.: Non-functional
The system shall maintain an inventory of medicines with stock levels and track expiration dates.: Functional
The Teams app shall be designed to scale based on the size of the organization.: Non-functional
System shall be deployable and operational in under one minute upon USB insertion.: Non-functional
System shall have a backup power supply for power failures.: Non-functional
The feature of the application shall provide the optimized route for the given addresses: Functional
The codebase shall be well-maintained with clean coding practices and thorough documentation to facilitate ease of maintenance.: Non-functional
User shall apply video editing effects such as background blur, video speed adjustment, fade in and out, and animated texts and fonts.: Non-functional
System shall provide submission status (Accepted, Wrong Answer, Time Limit Exceeded, etc.) for the user's code solutions.: Non-functional

System shall be able to register new users and store their information securely in the database.: Functional
A Data Consuming User shall have default visualizations for multi-year datasets.: Functional
The SQL database must have scalable capacity.: Non-functional
System shall allow only admins to update the database.: Non-functional
System shall support basic archival description creation and updates.: Functional
The system shall rotate the picture by 90 degrees.: Functional
The system shall minimize user errors and make error recovery effortless.: Non-functional
The system shall be scalable to accommodate a growing volume of data and users.: Non-functional
The system shall allow users to search for ebooks by title, author, genre, etc. and browse curated collections.: Functional
Users shall be able to register with a unique ID using their email address.: Functional
The user connecting to the server shall have a supported shell (bash, dash, fish, csh, tcsh, ksh, or zsh).: Functional
User shall experience adaptability and flexibility in the app, accommodating evolving user needs, technological advancements, and market trends through modular architectures and extensible design patterns.: Non-functional
System shall allow administrator to block any service by entering the name or selecting from a list.: Functional
Developing this product native-first enables cross-platform functionality.: Non-functional
If the validation succeeds, user shall be redirected to the authorized-user-home page.: Functional
A list of disputes meeting search criteria must be provided, differentiating by color-coded status.: Functional
The system shall be able to add restaurant information upon administrator login.: Functional
User shall be able to share files, screen share, conduct group screen sharing, and send contacts.: Functional
Queries exceeding 1 minute should be terminated.: Non-functional
Only maintainers are allowed to add new videos to the website.: Non-functional
The system shall maintain an inventory of medicines with stock levels and track expiration dates.: Functional
The Teams app shall be designed to scale based on the size of the organization.: Non-functional
System shall be deployable and operational in under one minute upon USB insertion.: Non-functional
System shall have a backup power supply for power failures.: Non-functional
The feature of the application shall provide the optimized route for the given addresses: Functional
The codebase shall be well-maintained with clean coding practices and thorough documentation to facilitate ease of maintenance.: Non-functional
User shall apply video editing effects such as background blur, video speed adjustment, fade in and out, and animated texts and fonts.: Non-functional
System shall provide submission status (Accepted, Wrong Answer, Time Limit Exceeded, etc.) for the user's code solutions.: Non-functional
